channel.title: EU on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in EU on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: The Encryption Debate in the European Union
item.description: Authors: Koomen, Maria and Koomen, Maria Published: May 2019 URL: https://carnegieendowment.org/2019/05/30/encryption-debate-in-european-union-pub-79220 Abstract: As fears of terrorism intensified, EU member states have demanded a European policy solution to questions around encryption.
